data.description: 3158 Catalpa Dr is a charming single-family home located in the heart of Berkley, MI. Built in 1951, this two-story property offers a perfect blend of vintage aesthetics and modern updates. With a total finished area of 1,000 square feet, this home provides ample space for comfortable living. The property features one full bathroom, which is tastefully designed and well-maintained. The absence of a half bathroom ensures a more spacious layout and convenient utilization of space. The lot size spans an impressive 6,534 square feet, offering a generous outdoor area for relaxation and entertainment. The detached 2 car garage is 3/4 insulated and drywalled, and the concrete of the garage,driveway, and back patio all seamlessly flow together for a great entertainment space in the 1 1/2 lot size. This home's design includes a mix of classic and timeless features, making it an attractive choice for those seeking a unique living experience. The kitchen and bathroom have been remodeled, and central air installed into the home. The property's location provides easy access to Berkley's bustling city center, offering residents a wide range of amenities, including shopping, dining, and entertainment options. Whether you are looking for a cozy family home or a stylish residence, 3158 Catalpa Dr is an excellent choice for those seeking a property with character and a touch of nostalgia.
